Why didn't my arms hold you and kill you that day?
lyric.verse: Catching the wind The sound of waves run on an don Drawing a circle The sunlight was whispering so softly I had no fear of the upcoming future Inside your brown eyes Reflecting only dreams I loved you to death Even further deep inside your lips There were no such things as eternity in the afternoon When the blue sky was singing sweetly
lyric.chorus: Why didn't my arms hold you and kill you that day?
lyric.verse: I didn't want to leave it Like things that disappear As time goes by
lyric.chorus: Who is inside your arms now? Those arms which used to hold me If there's nothing left My arms should've vanished in you forever That day holding you inside my arms
